sql.sql: select p.sl_1,p.yxqq,p.yxqz from cs_gy_glb_zspm p where p.zspm_dm = ? and p.yxbz = 'Y' and p.xybz = 'Y' and p.swjg_dm = ? and p.swjg_dm != '00000000000'
select p.zsl from cs_gy_glb_zspm p where p.zspm_dm = ? and p.swjg_dm = ? and p.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and p.yxbz = 'Y' and p.xybz = 'Y'
SELECT SJZSPM_DM FROM DM_GY_ZSPM WHERE ZSXM_DM = ? AND XYBZ = 'Y' AND YXBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR SJZSPM_DM = ZSPM_DM START WITH ZSPM_DM = ?
select * from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb a where a.bhzrdjxh = ? and ? between a.hznsyxqq and a.hznsyxqz
SELECT SJZSPM_DM FROM DM_GY_ZSPM WHERE ZSXM_DM = ? AND XYBZ = ? AND YXBZ = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR SJZSPM_DM = ZSPM_DM START WITH ZSPM_DM = ?

select t.uuid, t.mbbh, t.mbmc, t.xh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.zfsbz, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zsdlfs_dm, t.nsqx_dm, t.sbqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.yxbz from cs_rd_sfzrdmbb t where t.mbbh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.uuid, t.swjg_dm, t.cs_dm_1, t.cs_dm_2, t.cs_dm_3, t.cs_dm_4, t.cs_dm_5, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.yxbz from CS_RD_SFZRDMBGZPZB t where t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.fszsxm_dm, t.fszspm_dm, t.hzbz from cs_rd_zfsdzb t, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where t.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zsxm_dm = ? and (t.zspm_dm = ? or t.zspm_dm = ?) and t.swjg_dm<>'00000000000'
select * from Rd_Qyfhtsxswclgdtjkjczrdb where bardjxh=? and zrfbz=? and nvl(zfbz_1,'N')=?
select * from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb a where a.djxh = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and ? between a.hznsyxqq and a.hznsyxqz and a.yxbz = ?

with hznsrbaxx as (select bhzrdjxh, bhznsqynsrsbh, bhznsqynsrmc, bhznsqydz, sbjnfs_dm, yzskfw_dm, yzl, desl_1, yzbl, hznsyxqq, hznsyxqz, hznsuuid, hznsmxuuid from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb where djxh = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and yxbz = ?) select a.fzjghfddjxh bhzrdjxh, a.fzjghfdnsrsbh bhznsqynsrsbh, a.fzjghfdmc bhznsqynsrmc, c.scjydz bhznsqydz, sbjnfs_dm, yzskfw_dm, yzl, desl_1, yzbl, hznsyxqq, hznsyxqz, hznsuuid, hznsmxuuid from dj_fzjgxx a left join dj_nsrxx c on a.fzjghfddjxh = c.djxh left join hznsrbaxx b on a.fzjghfddjxh = b.bhzrdjxh where a.djxh = ? and to_date(?, ?) between a.yxqq and a.yxqz and (1 = ? or a.fzjghfdnsrsbh like ?) and (1 = ? or a.fzjghfdmc like ?) and (1 = ? or b.bhznsqynsrsbh is null) and (1 = ? or b.bhznsqynsrsbh is not null)
select sbjnfs_dm,sbjnfsmc,bz from dm_dj_sbjnfs where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y'
select * from dj_fzjgxx h where h.djxh =? and ? between h.yxqq and h.yxqz

SELECT 1 FROM dm_gy_zspm t, rd_sfzrdxxb r WHERE r.djxh = ? and r.zsxm_dm = '10101' and r.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and r.yxbz = 'Y' and (r.rdyxqq < to_date('2016-05-01', 'yyyy/mm/dd') or t.sfygzzspmbz = 'N')

select t.kjuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.zdkjyy, t.htbh, t.xmmc, t.zsfs_dm, t.jsyj_dm, t.hdlrl, t.kcxm_dm, t.sl_1, t.qtsl, t.jsff, t.kjqx, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1 from rd_zdkjywrxx t where t.htbh = ? and (1 = ? or t.xmmc = ?) and t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.djxh,r.yxqq from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh t, rd_nsrzgxx_jgb r where t.djxh = r.djxh and (to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN r.yxqq and r.sjzzrq) and r.yxqq < r.yxqz and(r.nsrzglx_dm = '201' or r.nsrzglx_dm = '202') and r.qxbz = 'N' and (r.zfbz_1 = 'N' OR r.ZFBZ_1 is null)
select t.djxh, min(r.rdyxqq) nrygzsdrq from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh t, rd_sfzrdxxb r where t.djxh = r.djxh and r.yskm_dm = '101010401' and r.yxbz = 'Y' group by t.djxh

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE, T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGRQ, T.GFJBJG_DM, T.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, T.JFJC_DM, T.SFZYZSPM FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')<=t.rdyxqz OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')>=t.rdyxqq)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSDLFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSQX_DM = ?) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ

select j.djxh, j.yxqq, j.yxqz, j.sjzzrq, j.rdpzuuid, j.nsrzglx_dm, j.qxbz, j.wszg, j.zfbz_1, j.zfr_dm, j.zfrq_1, j.lrr_dm, j.lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb j where j.djxh = ? and j.nsrzglx_dm in ('201','202') and (j.zfbz_1 is null or j.zfbz_1 = 'N') and j.yxqq < j.sjzzrq and j.yxqq < j.yxqz order by j.yxqq asc

select g.swjg_dm,g.nsqx_dm,g.sbqx_dm,g.jkqx_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz g, (select c.swjg_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz c, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where c.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.zsxm_dm = ? and c.zspm_dm = ? and rownum = 1) k where g.swjg_dm = k.swjg_dm and g.zsxm_dm = ? and g.zspm_dm = ?

select distinct t.djxh, t.qcuuid, t.clzt, t.txfwlb_dm, t.txzt, t.txfssj, t.clsj, t.xgmnsrnhwlwxse, t.xgmnsrnysfwxse, t.xgmnsryrdsbfxqq, t.xgmnsryrdsbfxqz, t.lrrq, t.scsj, t.xgrq from rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc t, dj_ls_djxhandssq ls where t.djxh = ls.djxh and ls.uuid = ?

select s.djxh,s.nsqx_dm,d.hdzxqq deyxqq,d.sjzxqz deyxqz,d.hy_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg d,rd_sfzrdxxb s where d.djxh = ? and d.djxh = s.djxh and d.zsxm_dm = s.zsxm_dm and d.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (d.zfbz_1 is null or d.zfbz_1 = 'N') and s.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.uuid, t.swjg_dm, t.csdmz_1, t.csdmz_2, t.csdmz_3, t.csdmz_4, t.csdmz_5, t.mbbh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.yxbz from cs_rd_sfzrdmbgzdzb t where t.yxbz = 'Y'

select g.swjg_dm,g.nsqx_dm,g.sbqx_dm,g.jkqx_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz g, (select c.swjg_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz c, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where c.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.zsxm_dm = ? and c.zspm_dm = ? and rownum = 1) k where g.swjg_dm = k.swjg_dm and g.zsxm_dm = ? and g.zspm_dm = ?

select a.yskm_dm as code, a.yskmmc as caption from dm_gy_yskm a where a.djxybz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.yxqq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and (a.yxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') or a.yxqz is null) and a.zsxm_dm = ?

select * from dj_nsrxx a where exists (select 1 from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t where t.yxqz < ? and t.sjzzrq >= sysdate and t.nsrzglx_dm = ? and a.djxh = t.djxh and (t.zfbz_1 = ? OR t.ZFBZ_1 is null)) and a.ssgly_dm is not null
